She’s a household name at this point
The one, the only, the Melina. These are high-rise straight-leg pants with five-pocket styling and a universally flattering fit. They’re made with our innovative Vegan Leather that looks and feels like the real thing. They have an authentic drape and a soft sheen that feels right from day one.

Reasons to love our Vegan Leather fabric
Best in Class Looks and feels like the real thing, thanks to an authentic drape and soft sheen.
Buttery Soft It has a supple finish and flexible hold.
Unparalleled Finish Smooth, never sticky.
Easy Care Our Vegan Leather is machine washable. Go ahead, live in it.

Rated 5 out of 5
Extremely Comfy - Size Up!
I never usually write reviews, but these pants deserve the extra love! I purchased the pants (in black - I highly recommend them since they will truly… read more go with everything) in my regular size 6. For reference, I have a small-ish waist and am petite, but I have curvy hips, which makes getting pants really difficult. While I could technically button the size 6 pants, they were extremely tight and would not have stretched enough. I went into the store and exchanged for a size 8 and they were perfect! I have about a 28.5 waist and 39.5 hips. The sales associate told me that they stretch about a 1/2 size so consider that if the pants fit but are a *tad* tight. I generally don't like being constricted, so I'm glad I sized up. In general, once you find your size, you won't regret this purchase! read less

Cookie Preference Center

We use cookies and similar technologies for analytics, advertising, and service operations purposes. You can limit certain information that cookies and similar technologies collect about you by selecting the checkboxes below. If you opt-out of any cookies, please note that the opt-out is specific to each browser and device, so you will need to opt-out on every browser and device that you use. If you visit us after clearing your cookies, you will need to opt-out again. For more information about each cookie category, click on the arrow beside each category name. For more information about our use of cookies and similar technologies and our collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information, see our Privacy Policy.

Manage Preferences

Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for our website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems.

Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

Performance / Analytics Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular, see how visitors move around the site and undertake analytics in relation to our services. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor performance. These cookies may be further used by our partners for their own purposes as set out in their cookie and privacy policies, such as understanding and improving their own products and services.

Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our sites by our advertising and other partners. They may be used by us and those companies to build a profile of your interests, remember your preferences and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store direct identifiers, like names, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising or benefit from personalisation of our services. These cookies may be further used by our partners for their own purposes as set out in their cookie and privacy policies.
